    • Uses of TrianglePoint in net.javachallenge.api

      Methods in net.javachallenge.api that return TrianglePoint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TrianglePoint Squad.getCurrentLocation()
      Returns the current location of the squad.
      TrianglePoint Squad.getDestinationLocation()
      Returns the destination of the squad.
      TrianglePoint Vein.getLocation()
      Returns the location of the vein.
      TrianglePoint ComputerPlayer.getTemporalVeinLocation()
      Returns the saved temporal vein location to occupy first.
      static TrianglePoint Make.point(int x, int y)
      Constructs a location which represents a vertex of a tile.
      TrianglePoint MockPlayer.selectVein(Game game) 
      abstract TrianglePoint ComputerPlayer.selectVein(Game game)
      Returns the selected vein location to occupy first.
      Methods in net.javachallenge.api that return types with arguments of type TrianglePoint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<TrianglePoint> Squad.getPath()
      Returns the path of the squad from the current location to the destination as a copied mutable list.
      java.util.ArrayList<TrianglePoint> TrianglePoint.getShortestPath(TrianglePoint to)
      Returns the shortest path from this position to the specified position as a copied mutable list.
      java.util.ArrayList<TrianglePoint> Vein.getShortestPath(Vein to)
      Returns the shortest path from this vein to the specified vein as a copied mutable list.
      java.util.HashSet<TrianglePoint> Field.getValidCoords()
      Returns the valid TrianglePoint instances as a copied mutable set.
      java.util.TreeMap<TrianglePoint,Vein> Field.getVeinMap()
      Returns the Map instance of the locations (key) and the veins (value) as a copied mutable map.
      java.util.TreeMap<TrianglePoint,Vein> Field.getVeinMap(int playerId)
      Returns the filtered Map instance of the locations (key) and the veins (value) by the specified id of the owner player as a copied mutable map.

      Returns the vein with the specified location.
      boolean TrianglePoint.isConnected(TrianglePoint that)
      Returns true if this and that are connected, else otherwise
      void ComputerPlayer.saveTemporalVeinLocation(TrianglePoint location)
      Saves the temporal vein location to occupy first for selecting your vein.

      Constructs a command to upgrade the productivity of the vein at the given location.
      static Command Commands.upgradeRobot(TrianglePoint location)
      Constructs a command to upgrade the reproduction rate of the robots at the given vein.

      Constructs a command with the number of robots to send, and the coordinates of the vein from and to where the robots should go to.
